name: Escape The Tank
description:
Lone dev, this is the first game i have ever made, it is the result of teaching myself how to develop

it is a simple 3d platform game set in a fish tank.

avoid dangers, solve problems, jump around to find your way out. pretty simple stuff but surprisingly fun to play.

this game is no tripleA blockbuster, but i am hoping the simplicity of this game might inspire others to try and learn developing as well.
